summary: The provided text shows no changes to the Perplexity AI Legal Policies.  The Privacy Policy and Acceptable Use Policy are identical in both the old and new content.  There is no information about changes to other legal documents. Therefore, the analysis below reflects this.
analysis: No changes were detected between the old and new content for the provided Perplexity AI legal documents. The Privacy Policy and Acceptable Use Policy are exactly the same.  A comprehensive analysis requires access to the complete set of Perplexity AI Legal Policies, not just the snippets provided.  The last updated dates indicate the documents have been recently reviewed, but that does not in itself imply changes to their content.
